notes.text: AreaMicroChart, PercentageMicroChart and ColumnMicroChart controls moved to sap.suite.ui.microchart
BulletMicroChart: Control copied
BulletMicroChart: Transparent scale mode added
ComparisonMicroChart: Control copied
DeltaMicroChart: Control copied
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ColumnMicroChart: New Explored sample added.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: New control introduced to sap.suite.ui.microchart library
sap.suite.ui.microchart: New samples with charts in Generic Tile added.
sap.suite.ui.microchart: added new UI library
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonChart Correct tab sequence.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.HarveyBallMicroChart: Rendering stabilized in case of missing fraction scale
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Descriptions in the API reference of micro charts adapted
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Fix cursor styles within library
sap.suite.ui.microchart.RadialMicroChart: Minimum size of RadialMicroChart added to improve responsiveness
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Actual value in tooltip added for delta mode
sap.suite.ui.microchart.HarveyBallMicroChart: Corrected default values of boolean properties
sap.suite.ui.microchart.HarveyBallMicroChart: Improved behaviour if total scale is not provided.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Fix UTF character handling
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Color calculation for empty targetValue property stabilized
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: improve CSS dependent rendering to avoid miss rendering
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: CSS-dependent rendering improved to avoid incorrect rendering
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Line endings in HCB corrected
sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Chart width after an orientation change adjusted
